concept.title: Configuring the resource adapter for administered objects
concept.shortdesc: To configure destination objects for use in inbound and outbound communication, define the properties of an administered destination object.

conbody.p:
Complete the following steps to create and configure a new J2C administered destination object by using the panels.
Log on to the administrative console.
Click ResourcesResource AdaptersJ2C administered objects .
Click New, complete the Name and Administered object class fields.
Click Apply.
Click the J2C administered objects custom properties link in the Additional Properties panel to edit.
Click Save to save your changes.
Table 1 lists the properties of a J2C administered object that are used to configure the resource adapter for inbound and outbound communication.

table.title: J2C administered object properties
table.desc:
List of the properties of a J2C administered object that are used to configure the resource adapter for inbound and outbound communication
lists the properties of a J2C administered object that are used to configure the resource adapter for inbound and outbound communication.

row.entry: The name of the Topic or Queue.
